phrases: Rin Okumura, the son of Satan!
Thank you for your good work!
Did you think I would allow demons over mid-class to enter the Academy?
Doctors, please tend to the wounded.
This training camp was your Esquire exam at the same time!
During the camp, teachers were observing and testing you.
I will decide your final grades after reading their reports.
I cannot believe it was a surprise exam...
It is pointless to worry about that now.
I did hardly anything worth mentioning!
Mr. Okumura told us right before the exam.
They tested our qualities for Esquire in a real battle situation...
But in that case, I was the worst of all.
You will be fine, I guess.
Those two just sat back and did absolutely nothing.
Do not you have anything to say?
I got the Claw of the Scaly Dragon.
There is nothing I would want to talk about with you!
He was so mysterious all the time.
He is so good at ventriloquism!
It is okay, I am more or less fine by now.
You will get the best grade, that is for sure.
I do not even want to imagine what would have happened without you there.
You will pass, that is for sure.
By the way, Okumura, how did you defeat that Ghoul?
Well I just... slashed it with this...
You are really fit for a Knight!
Would it hurt to be more specific?
Yeah, just look at me, I am a great mistake!
He is just a Page but he defeated a mid-class demon without support.
Your actions yesterday clearly deviated from the arrangements of the exam.
True, there were other teachers on the watch,
but independently putting a student in danger like that
You tried to make Rin Okumura use his powers in front of other students.
Only a selected few teachers know about him.
Sir Pheles should have briefed you on that.
I acted as I was ordered by Sir Pheles.
Try to kill him, he told me.
Just as you are acting as the brake to his powers,
I was chosen as the accelerator.
It was to understand Rin Okumura's powers as much as possible.
The demon was examined to find out if he is fit for use as a weapon of the Order.
You little genius of an Exorcist are always so busy.
At least share the burden of watching over a demon.
My brother is in relatively good control of his powers and emotions.
You should have seen that yesterday.
Come on, it is not like I would actually kill him.
Yesterday was tough, was not it, Ni?
Sorry to disturb you this late.
She went to stock up so I am taking care of the shop.
Can I help you with anything?
It is just the two of us!
I wanted to talk about your future.
I did not enter the cram school determined to become an Exorcist like the others,
so I did not really know what to choose...
It is embarrassing to be so half-hearted about it.
Shiemi, do you remember our first meeting?
I had just become an Exorcist,
Where will you end up if you are already so anxious?
It is just a supply store.
I told you about Yukio earlier and today I brought him with me.
He is an Exorcist from today!
He is not even 14 yet, so take good care of him for me.
So young and yet so splendid!
Shiemi, come out for a second!
She could be mistaken for a household spirit, could not she?
She is my daughter, but she is way too shy.
Shiemi, he is the same age as you but he is an Exorcist teacher already!
She is as shy as ever.
I hoped she would be interested.
That sounds so strange, just call me casually.
Sorry, I was so terrible back then!
I am not that impressive a person.
When I was little I was a crybaby, and my brother had to help me all the time.
He was always doing stuff I could not.
So back then I admired him a lot.
Rin is so kind, is not he?
But people cannot stay children forever.
I know that you have worked hard to change.
But you need determination to continue further with your training.
Even more now that you know you have talent as a Tamer.
Talk it through with the Manager and decide before tomorrow's announcements.
If you become an Esquire, you have to be prepared to risk your life.
You need the consent of your guardian.
During that test I thought it was useless...
Sorry that it ended up a bit tougher than it should have been.
But a test is a test.
It was controlled not to go beyond a certain level... supposedly.
The teachers were there to ensure your safety.
Did not you say you would not kill him, Mr. Neuhaus?
Were you trying to seduce me in my sleep?
You would not wake up, so Yuki carried you to another room.
He told me to just stay he -
Why is killing my brother necessary to you?
For wherever the carcass is, there will the eagles be gathered together.
This is the strongest Naberius I have.
If I could just erase the circle...
You were an enemy after all!
Holy water works, even though you wear a human skin.
You cannot hide your true nature.
You will damage your body if you try to summon another.
Do you want to die of blood loss?
I am a survivor of the Blue Night.
The Blue Night took place 16 years ago,
when Satan simultaneously slaughtered many of the world's prominent clergymen.
For a moment Satan possessed my body.
and my family who tried to help me.
Satan used my own hands to kill them!
And definitely not the son of Satan!
even if it costs my life!
If this still is not enough for you,
I will fight you as many times as you want.
I am used to this shit...
Do not drag innocent people into this!
As if you would get away with this!
My wounds have always healed fast.
That must be treated right away!
It is okay, I am fine!
Ni, can you give me some sancho?
He is always doing stuff I cannot.
I am no match to him after all.
Cannot we at least have barbeque?!
I am sorry about professor Neuhaus' actions.
I did not think a teacher would get so carried away by emotions.
I will prevent further events like this.
Mr. Okumura, are you okay with lemonade?
Neuhaus did just as I instructed him, but apparently it was too much for him.
Come to True Cross Academy right away.
I cannot enter the campus because of your barriers, Brother.
We will talk about the details later.
Father and Brother are so obsessed with this Rin Okumura.
I wonder how strong he is.
Hope he will be good to kill my boredom.
Cheese, pork and mochi pancake is one of my top three favorites!
You might be the Principal, but this is first come, first serve.
There is no Exorcist at the Academy able to tame a demon of that level.
sei wo uke sorezore ga jinsei wo ouka
nou no black box wo shiru sore wa kou ka
you wa limit line wo subete ryouga
saa ikou ka fumidasu sore wa kyou da
yappa hibi wa ika sen kou sotsunaku konashitecha no no
stop nagare wo mikiwamena mazu mono to mo sezu ikou ze (here we go)
todokanu mono ya kagiri aru mono ni
atsuku naru mune wo osaetsukeru no wa
rikai mo sezu osaetsukeyou to shitekita
ano otonatachi to onaji jan ka yo
mune wo moyasu hi wa dare ni mo keseya shinai
sora kara furu kuroi ame ga kono mi nurashi furitomanakutomo
mada ore wa kawareru jibun de kaetemiseru
kore ga sou pride sorezore no basho de
mada mada kieru na kokoro no hi wo
mada mada ikeru zo ikeru zo
After birth, people live as they wish
They then learn the black box in their head; is that bliss?
Just cross over, beyond the line of your limit
Let us go, take a step, and I mean this minute
Life's a bitch, so if it is easy, you are doing it wrong
Stop, which way is the world going?
Then ignore it and go wherever (here we go)
There are things I could never have, things with time
Is there a reason I force my heart upon them?
I never tried to understand, I just forced it on them
I am no better than those lifeless adults
Even if it is just a pipe dream I could never have
But no one can put out the fire in my heart
The black rain may pour hard and leave me drenched
But I know I can change, I will change myself
This is my pride, what makes up my core
I will not let my fire be put out; not yet
I will keep going, and I will never stop
(Please be) Dakara moshi kono mune ga
(With me) Michi ni mayou hi ni wa
Mirai e no tobira wo hiraite hoshii
This is what they call fate.
the way we keep on shining together.
Let us keep our gazes locked
so it will not fade away.
(Please be) Maybe the day will come
(With me) that we will lose our way
while looking for the door to the future.
Ready, ready, ready for the take off
So do not let go of my hand.
Ready, ready, ready for the take off.
Hold on to the bonds we have
Ready, ready, ready for the take off.
Hold on to the bonds we have
